6 Eastview Drive, Scott Township

$154,900

Save $$$ on Heating

A new natural gas, forced hot air furnace supplies the home with reliable heating and central air conditioning. Stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter without breaking the bank.

Close to Everything

Being located an equal distance from downtown Clarks Summit and Dickson City means you have quick access to everything the area has to offer. With accessibility to I-81, travel is a breeze.

Peaceful Neighborhood

Eastview Drive is home to both long-time residents and young families. The quiet loop of Eastview and Westview Drive provides a quiet place for morning walks and after dinner strolls.

3 beds • 1 bath • 1,660 sqft

Move right into this updated bi-level located in the scenic hills of Clarks Summit. Enjoy the comfort of gas heat and central air conditioning. Updated carpet, laminate flooring, and plenty of windows for natural light make this home an inviting place for entertaining, relaxing, and growing together. The finished lower level, half acre of yard, and safe neighborhood makes this a great place for kids.
